property.name: lookupFieldName
property.label: Lookup Field Name
property.description: DeveloperName for the lookup field on the Record Attribute object that points to the record you are filtering.

property.name: uniqueFieldName
property.label: Unique Field Name
property.description: Field Name on the target object (eg Product) that is the unique identifier - can be ID or another External Id field.

property.name: expandedLevels
property.label: Initially Expanded Levels
property.description: Which levels should be pre-expanded - L0, L1, L2, etc.
